description: This blog was created using Forestry & Gridsome
cta: To get started, import this site into Forestry or checkout the repository here.
about: Jonathan Kornman combines his background in radio (WVUM,Dublab), talent management (Liason Artists) and entertainment law (attorney licensed in California) to meet his clients’ podcasting needs. This includes everything from audio editing and production to project management and consulting. Helping creatives reach their potential is what drives Jonathan to be not just a collaborator but a genuine “friend of the pod”
